## Types of Facts

| Type | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Additive | Sum across all dimensions |
| Semi-additive | Sum across some |
| Non-additive | Cannot be summed |

## Best Practices

- Grain first
- Keep facts atomic
- Store foreign keys
- Include date stamps
